project.name: d3web-SharedKnowledge
project.description:
Creator: norman Creation Context: d3web.KnowME plugin Coders: norman, aha, marty, chris, joba Supervisor: joba
Short: Domain model of auxilary knowledge (similarity, weight, abnormality)
Long: The project contains additional knowledge used by various types of problem solvers: - similarity for question values - weights for questions - abnormality knowledge for question values E.g., such knowledge is used by the CBR and the set-covering methods.
